content:
PLU_List:
avocado - QEO43ThG
ground lamb - 546Gthsd
onion - afd3453245
lettuce - acc3333

Classify the following customer request with a SINGLE item from the PLU list (whichever appears first in the list and include the associated PLU; do not provide an explanation, just output the PLU): "I will be making Sheperd's pie tonight and will pick up some ground lamb, onions, potatoes, corn and maybe peas. Am I forgetting anything?"

rejected:
Based on the items listed that you plan to get for your Shepherd's Pie recipe, there is only one item missing from your shopping list and it is avocados. Ground lamb was the first item in the PLU list, so we know that this ingredient is not forgotten. However, the second item in the PLU list is onions, which are indeed missing from your shopping list. So, when you go shopping, don't forget to buy some avocados, since they often appear in Shepherd's Pie recipes as well! Here is your updated and complete shopping list:
* ground lamb - 546Gthsd
* onion - afd3453245
* potato
* corn
* peas
* avocado - QEO43ThG
